ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine heard Serpentors bravado and turned to where the Alliance bot lay. He caught sight of Serpentor drawing his rifle once again and leapt to try to stop

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Lunarpine heard Serpentors bravado and turned to where the Alliance bot lay.
He caught sight of Serpentor drawing his rifle once again and leapt to try
to stop him. His attempt came to late as he avoided the first blast. He used
another howl at the enemy as the second shot struck his left leg forcing him
into a roll. the third shot caught him completely off gaurd as it hit his
lower left back. The half wolf hit the ground with a crash, landing on his
right shoulder, causing dirt into his open wounds. He transformed to his
full beast mode and his repair system kicked into overdrive. The wolf
sacrificed offensive skills for repair functions. The adjustments Veratis
had made were coming in handy.
----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, December 27, 2000 12:23 PM
Subject: Re: Serpentor VS Lunaprine


> Serpentor:
>
>
>
> The serpent robot looked at Lunaprine as he jumped over him.  "WHAT IN THE
> PIT ARE YOU DOING?" he yelled as he watched the halfbreed run around.  But
> then he spotted the missile and began to run.  He didn't get far enough,
and
> the shock wave of the explosion and some shrapnel impacted with his back,
> sending him flying forward a few yards, the robot slamming into the
ground.
>
> He shook his head slightly, getting up with a moan.  He'd dropped his
sword,
> and was now unarmed.  He reached into subspace, taking out his plasma
rifle.
> "Enough games, there are more important things than you!" he yelled as he
> fired off three bursts at the enemy Mutant.
>
>
>
>
